dcterms:description: A knowledge graph dataset of tourist attractions based on tourism data collected from various sources on Socotra Island, Yemen, containing information about scenic spots and tourists' historical interactions.
dcterms:title: Knowledge graph dataset of tourist attractions based on tourism data on Socotra Island-Yemen

dcterms:description: A collection of knowledge graphs including NELL, DBpedia, Google Knowledge Graph, and Microsoft Satori, utilized for enhancing recommendation systems.
dcterms:title: NELL, DBpedia, Google Knowledge Graph, Microsoft Satori
